originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: South Africa beat Zimbabwe to set up NZ semi-final
title: South Africa beat Zimbabwe to set up NZ semi-final
content: South Africa produce an unconvincing performance with the bat as they beat Zimbabwe by five wickets to set up a semi-final against New Zealand

originalTitle: “Trump chose an avoidable war over a good deal.”
title: “Trump chose an avoidable war over a good deal.”
content: Trita Parsi says Iran had offered major nuclear concessions and that Trump could have claimed diplomatic victory.

originalTitle: Moment Iranian drone hits UAE naval base
title: Moment Iranian drone hits UAE naval base
content: Video from Abu Dhabi captured the moment a second Iranian drone struck the Al Salam Naval Base.

originalTitle: Who are the council members temporarily in charge of Iran?
title: Who are the council members temporarily in charge of Iran?
content: Until Khamenei's successor is picked, three-member leadership council, including Ayatollah Arafi, will lead Iran.

originalTitle: At least 153 dead after reported strike on school, Iran says
title: At least 153 dead after reported strike on school, Iran says
content: Iran has blamed the US and Israel for the strike; the US is looking into reports of the incident, while the IDF says it is "not aware" of operations in the area.

originalTitle: Nine dead in missile attack on Israel as Iran strikes region
title: Nine dead in missile attack on Israel as Iran strikes region
content: Several deaths are reported across the Middle East as Tehran retaliates for massive strikes by the US and Israel.

originalTitle: What we know so far about the US-Israel attacks and Iran's retaliation
title: What we know so far about the US-Israel attacks and Iran's retaliation
content: Iran responds by launching missiles and drones towards Israel and four Gulf Arab countries that host US military bases.

originalTitle: 'Hearts & Motherwell the winners after damaging Old Firm stalemate'
title: 'Hearts & Motherwell the winners after damaging Old Firm stalemate'
content: BBC Scotland's chief sportswriter Tom English evaluates the impact of Sunday's draw at Ibrox.

originalTitle: 'Not fair to fans' - how VAR denied Burnley one of greatest comebacks
title: 'Not fair to fans' - how VAR denied Burnley one of greatest comebacks
content: Burnley were set to complete one of the greatest Premier League comebacks - until VAR intervened. BBC Sport takes a look at whether the decisions were correct.

originalTitle: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
title: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
content: Manchester City have often been accused of being too reliant on Erling Haaland this season. There are signs that could be changing.
